name: Forts & Enemies
description:
This was based off of the Gun Fight lesson.

PRESS THE TEXT NOT THE ICON WHEN YOU TRY TO BUY SOMETHING

WASD to move.

Click things in the shop to interact with the. (you'll know when you bought something if your coins go down!)

F to punch,(basic) and the rest is told in the shop next to the text.

If there is no button next to the text in the shop then it's a passive ability.
